metadata.title: TROOPERS24: Forensic Security Monitoring in Automotive Cybersecurity
metadata.description:
Talk by Christopher Corbett, Dr. Karsten Schmidt - June 26th, 2024 at TROOPERS24 IT security conference in Heidelberg, Germany hosted by @ERNW_ITSec

#TROOPERS24 #ITsecurity 
https://troopers.de/troopers24/talks/qyyaes/

More impressions:
